Name: 飛花令~夏天的綠豆糕 Recite Poems The Second
About the game: This is a traditional game of a eastern country. Of course, in ancient, it's not a electronic game. In this game, the rules have some changes. In order to play this game, you must familiar with Chinese poetry culture. Please notice, this game only support Traditional Chinese, not support English. In this game, there are two modes —— levels mode and free mode. You must pass the all levels, the free mode unlock. In levels mode, there are 5 forms. The first is choose a corret word complete the blank of poets. The second is sort 5 words to complete the blank of poets. The third is typing a word to complete the blank of poets. The fourth is write half a sentence includes the theme word in the range of tang dynasty poets and song dynasty poets. The fifth is choose a half a sentence that it's half sentence above or below has the theme word.
